body: This is ntr without doubt.

@ShogunTanuki -You are entitled to your opinion and so the others users... First of all, is this NTR? Yeah, I think so. We don’t need to have such a narrow definition. Since, in my opinion, a loved one was stolen away from the male protagonist, that counts as NTR. It would have been easier to classify this as NTR if the male protagonist was married to the woman or be his girlfriend, BUT it need not always be the case. Again NTR isn't just between established couples when it comes to hentai and such... it also pertains to strongly Potential couples/Chilhoodfriends/Love ones/Familly members/etc...ie...a couple that WOULD have ended up together if the douche didn't come out of nowhere and literally rape the girl away from the guy.
this is not a NTR you fucking idiots
Lets hope that Yuzuki's next ntr work would be more like Another World rather than this
@memekudapat - You forgot to add to the end Setsuna making the Peace sign + Ahegao to send off Gin-chan... XD

Haha , its turning point guys, to be corrupted
If this mikezoutei, the end will be bitch some gyaru plus tatto all over the body...hahaha

Mixed feelings with this series but #1 of Hentai
NEVER FEEL FOR A CHARACTER (Unless Vanilla Extract is added :3 )
happy ending everyone, teacher x student love
Oh si, Shiraha, después de esto confundirá las cosas y volverá a la casa del sensei para seguir aprendiendo jejejejeje.
@metroid - Fair enough...
I know that but Hitoduma Ane is cheating not ntr so it doesnt count anyway

@metroid - In manga no but she has a incest Doujinshi (C87) [Lv.X+ (Yuzuki N Dash)] Hitoduma Ane / Married Sister *Spoiler* In this one the wife who was having an affair with his brother passed the brother child as his husband (giving him the news about she being pregnant) granted she never drawn a Prego scene or a heroine looking pregnant… If I’m not mistaken...
Well if that really happens it will be a first for Ynd as she never goes for pregnancy route in her NTR works

@metroid - Yeah, I also think this is the weakest of Yuzuki NTR works… If what that guys says is true it would make sense... If my memory doesn’t betray me I think it was page 8 that she touched her belly but maybe that was a coincided or maybe not… Again if I remember correctly in chapter one she didn’t react like most NTR heroine react when they got confessed or are about to get rescued by the power of love (her body language was way off)... and to be blunt it felt like she was sending him off (farewell) a final happy memory with him… Maybe in chapter 7 she makes a promise to sensei (she is that kind of girl [dumb one]) it could be because she is pregnant or perhaps because she quit Gin-chan or she fell in love with sensei (in this chapter she is even cooking for him) *facepalm* and she maybe think she needs to kept her promise or maybe she thinks she is tainted and doesn’t deserve him at all…

There is a guy who claims  he knows the ending but he is probably making it up  He says the slut girl gets pregnant from the teacher and they decide to marry later at the end we see the same scene  from the chapter one where the slut girl hits Gin on the head  which brings the story full circle
Well no matter how it ends I think this is YnD's weaker Ntr works this might have worked better as one shot

@metroid -  Ah, color pages Yummy! Thanks for describing the preview.  I appreciate that… Hmm... (25-28 pages) and going by what the preview is showing us I think it is going for the open ending or bad end. I don’t think there is enough pages to turn this story in favor of is childhood friend and if by any chance is a bittersweet ending/happyish ending it would felt like an a$$pull in my humble opinion.

Apparently next chapter previews are online and the next chapter will start with color pages where the slut girl gets depressed after hearing Tomoe's confession and since she is stupid she doesnt wait to hear Gin's answer and runs away and  as a result she decides to have more sex with sensei

@Metriod - Hello! I also agree that he should left this girl and go for the other one but chapter one (spoiled) told us that he rejected Tomoe, the girl who is confessing her love to him so in last page... I think I’m going with your theory of ambiguous ending. But your first theory of her sleeping behind his back plus passing sensei child (if she is pregnant) as Gin child and sensei getting the other girl it is not only wicked (Lol!) but it would not seem farfetched to me because of the genre (NTR) but tell me if I’m wrong if this prevail it would have been the first time Yuzuki goes for a complete bad end… minus Doujinshi works…
Where is the netorare tag? U fail at tagging again nhentai

There is only one more chapter left. Ideally Gin should leave the slut girl and go out with the girl who confessed to her but sicec this is a ntr work this is not liekly to happen. Worst ending would be him marrying the slut girl after she got pregnant with teachers kid  all the while she would keep  sleeping with teacher behind his back and maybe teacher also seducing the other girl who confessed to Gin  Since this is Yuzuki work it might also have an imbigious ending like Gin asking the slut girl to marry him and it might end there
relax dude, there's more Zutto Suki
I haven't read this whole thing but...wouldn't it be right/more or less fine if he went with the other girl? frankly she doesn't really have a right on him anymore, shes fallen for sensei?
OMG!!! HOLY SHIT!!!
